fullDescription.intro: This node calls the modern and versatile Subgroup Discovery tool Cortana. Thus making available in KNIME all the classical Subgroup Discovery methods for nominal and numeric data, as well as novel mining paradigms developed as part of the Exceptional Model Mining framework. As a scientific research tool, Cortana was also used for the development of other advancements in the Data Mining field like: statistical validation of subgroups and alternative (beam) search strategies. More on Subgroup Discovery and Cortana, including an extensive manual, can be found at: http://datamining.liacs.nl/cortana.html
